description: Bringing modern materials and fresh style to the trail-proven, button-down shirt, the Shade Lite™ Woven Long Sleeve Shirt serves up lightweight and breathable sun protection with a touch of class. Ideal for long days on the river, big treks through the mountains, and any outdoor adventure where the sun has you out in the open, the Shade Lite features secure pocket storage for your essentials, and integrated venting to increase airflow on hot days.
name: Mountain Hardwear Shade Lite LS Shirt - Mens
